description.en: Grande Luxxe in Nuevo Vallarta is an elegant, modern and sophisticated Mexican resort with exquisite accommodations. It has nine towers located between the shores of the tranquil Ameca River and Pacific Ocean just north of Puerto Vallarta in the state of Nayarit. Grande Luxxe brings together luxury and the abundance of nature to offer each guest an enchanting escape with excellent hospitality, comfort and entertainment. With state of the art 24 hour security and personal drivers for transportation, the resort provides the utmost in individual safety._/_We are owners at Grande Luxxe. We hope to be able to help you experience the same pleasure that we have found at Grande Luxxe. We can no longer use all the weeks we have. We are opening up opportunities for others to rent these weeks and experience the same pleasure.
description.es: Con nueve suntuosas torres de alojamientos construidas a lo largo del espectacular río Ameca, Grande Luxxe Nuevo Vallarta es un modelo de vivienda de lujo.

flavor_text.en: Superior luxury featured at the height of indulgence designed to inspire rest and relaxation. Whether you’re looking for a romantic escape, vacation with friends or place to bring together the entire family Grande Luxxe accommodations offer a sophisticated atmosphere of peace and harmony.
flavor_text.es: ***NEEDS UPDATED TEXT*** Desde hermosas habitaciones hasta lujosos lofts y amplias suites, Grande Luxxe Nuevo Vallarta ofrece una gran variedad de alojamientos de alta calidad.

flavor_text.en: With gorgeous designs and indulgent features, these luxurious pools offer the ultimate pool-side experience.
flavor_text.es: Con magníficos diseños y características indulgentes, estas lujosas piscinas ofrecen la mejor experiencia junto a la piscina.

flavor.en: Choose from an array of gourmet restaurants helmed by some of the world’s best chefs.
flavor.es: Elija entre una variedad de restaurantes gourmet dirigidos por algunos de los mejores chefs del mundo.

flavor.en: From elegant lounges to lively bars with live music, find the right setting for your evening.
flavor.es: Contamos con lounges elegantes, así como con bares animados con música en vivo. Encuentre el escenario que prefiera para pasar su noche.

flavor.en: Eat like royalty from the comfort of your own room thanks to our extensive room service menu.
flavor.es: Coma como la realeza –desde la comodidad de su propia habitación– gracias a nuestro extenso menú con servicio a la habitación.

flavor.en: Mexican, American, international—find the cuisine you crave from our wide selection of eateries.
flavor.es: Mexicana, americana, internacional: elija la cocina que más se le antoje de nuestra amplia selección de restaurantes.

flavor_text.en: Guests may choose to dine however they like in over 40 restaurants. Choose from a fast casual bite to eat on the go, a poolside culinary pampering or a fine dining experience. The food offerings are from all over the world including a gourmet market. Expect your taste buds to be delighted with flavors you’ll remember forever. Once you arrive browse through the inroom restaurant book to make your dining plans for the week. Contact the concierge for which restaurants require reservations and make your reservation early to guarantee your preferred day and time.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: Delight in the flavors of authentic Mexico with this Puebla-born dish, made with spit-roasted pork marinated with pineapple.
flavor_text.es: Deléitese con los sabores del México auténtico con este platillo nacido en Puebla, hecho con puerco asado en espada y piña.

description.en: Browse our selection of fine dining options at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta.
description.es: Conozca nuestra selección de opciones de alta cocina en Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta.

flavor.en: Authentic fine French cuisine in a modern setting
flavor.es: Auténtica cocina francesa en un escenario moderno.

flavor.en: The fresh, ingredient-driven dishes of Californian cuisine with a gorgeous ocean view
flavor.es: Los ingredientes frescos de los platillos de la cocina Californiana con una hermosa vista al mar.

flavor.en: The best of Mexican cuisine, elevated to stun the palate
flavor.es: Lo mejor de la cocina mexicana llevado a un nivel exquisito que fascinará a su paladar.

flavor.en: A tour of Asia’s brightest flavors and favorite dishes
flavor.es: Un tour con los platillos y sabores más exquisitos de Asia.

flavor.en: This rooftop eatery offers premium cuts, smoky flavors, and stunning views
flavor.es: Este restaurante ofrece cortes premium, sabores ahumados y vistas asombrosas.

flavor.en: Gourmet burgers with a sophisticated twist
flavor.es: Hamburguesas gourmet con un toque sofisticado.

flavor.en: Choose from an array of gourmet restaurants helmed by some of the world’s best chefs.
flavor.es: Una trattoria italiana que también es parrillada americana.

description.en: This beautiful restaurant is the perfect place to explore the flavors of French cuisine, which come in the form of modern, mouthwatering dishes. From bright salads and rich, comforting classics to innovative flavor-forward entrées and decadent desserts, Azur has the flavors to make your palate sing.
description.es: Este hermoso restaurante es el lugar perfecto para explorar los sabores de la cocina francesa, los cuales toman la forma de platillos modernos y exquisitos. Con sus deliciosas ensaladas, sus entradas llenas de sabores innovadores y sus maravillosos postres, Azur tiene todo lo necesario para seducir a su paladar.

header.es: Una nueva visión de la comida francesa

flavor_text.en: This celebrated French appetizer is served with garlic butter and parsley.
flavor_text.es: Este célebre aperitivo francés se sirve con mantequilla de ajo y perejil.

flavor_text.en: At La Plaza, 3rd Floor_/_Monday – Sunday 7 AM – 11 PM
flavor_text.es: En el tercer piso de La Plaza_/_Lunes – Domingo 7 AM – 11 PM

description.en: Costa Arena offers a wide variety of seafood dishes—prepared in a simple California-cuisine style—served in a breathtaking setting just above the sands bordering Banderas Bay. Dishes are made with the freshest shrimp, scallops, lobster, mussels, fish, crab cakes, and soft-shell crab—served buttered, marinated, seared, stuffed, grilled, breaded, or sautéed.
description.es: Costa Arena ofrece una amplia variedad de platillos con mariscos –preparados con el estilo sencillo de la cocina californiana– servidos en un escenario espectacular justo sobre las arenas que bordean la Bahía de Banderas. Los platillos están hechos con los camarones más frescos, ostiones, almejas, pescado y cangrejo blando y se sirven con mantequilla, marinados, a las brasas, rellenos, a la parrilla, empanizados o salteados.

header.es: Cocina del mar inspirada en California

flavor_text.en: Enjoy fresh seafood, including tuna tartare with soy sauce, ginger, and roasted chili pepper-soy sauce..
flavor_text.es: Disfrute de mariscos frescos como el tártar de atún con salsa de soya, jengibre y chile.

flavor_text.en: By the Grande Luxxe Punta Pool_/_Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 11 PM_/_Chef: Issac Hernandez
flavor_text.es: Cerca de la piscina de Grande Luxxe Punta_/_Lunes – Domingos 11 AM – 11 PM_/_Chef: Issac Hernández

description.en: At Epazote, Mexican favorites get a modern refresh while maintaining their traditional flavor profiles. Menu options include inspired renditions of cochinita pibil, chiles rellenos, mole, tamales, enchiladas, burritos, and gorditas. Don’t miss the all-new Tasting Menu, complete with a thoughtful wine pairing option.
description.es: En Epazote, los clásicos mexicanos obtienen un toque contemporáneo manteniendo sus sabores tradicionales. Las opciones del menú incluyen nuevas interpretaciones de la cochinita pibil, chiles rellenos, mole, tamales, enchiladas, burritos y gorditas. No se pierda el nuevo menú de degustación junto con un maridaje de vino inteligente.

header.en: A Modern Take on Mexican Cuisine
header.es: Una versión moderna de la cocina mexicana

flavor_text.en: This traditional Mexican specialty of lamb stew is slow cooked with maguey leaves for a rich, deep flavor.
flavor_text.es: Esta especialidad tradicional mexicana de estofado de cordero se cocina lentamente en hojas de maguey para obtener un sabor más rico y profundo.

flavor_text.en: In Grande Luxxe Tower 1, Ground Floor_/_Monday – Sunday 5:30 PM – 11 PM_/_Chef: Axel Jimenez Lira
flavor_text.es: En la torre 1 de Grande Luxxe, planta baja_/_Lunes – Domingo 5:30 PM – 11 PM_/_Chef: Axel Jiménez Lira

description.en: Transport yourself to the East and take a tour of the culinary traditions and delicacies of Asia with the flavors of a meal at Gong. Favorites include Peking Duck, lobster rolls, tempura ice cream, and dessert sushi. Or try the teppanyaki dinner, where you can watch your multiple-course dinner prepared on a grill right before you!
description.es: Transpórtese al Oriente y conozca las tradiciones culinarias de Asia con los sabores de una comida en Gong. Los favoritos incluyen pato pequinés, rollos de langosta, helado tempura y sushi. También puede probar la cena teppanyaki, donde podrá observar cómo preparan su comida de múltiples tiempos en una parrilla justo delante de usted.

flavor_text.en: This warm salmon sashimi comes complete with ginger and garlic, seared with olive oil, and a citrus soy sauce.
flavor_text.es: Este tibio sashimi de salmón está acompañado de jengibre y ajo, sazonado con aceite de oliva y salsa de soya cítrica.

flavor_text.en: By the Grande Mayan_/_Monday – Sunday 5:30 PM – 11 PM_/_Chef: Mitzuo Takahashi
flavor_text.es: Cerca de The Grande Mayan_/_Lunes – Domingos 5:30 PM – 11 PM_/_Chef: Mitzuo Takahashi

description.en: Situated in the Sky Lounge at the very top of Grande Luxxe’s new Tower 5, Quinto offers guests fine dining service set within a relaxed yet luxurious atmosphere, with breathtaking views of Banderas Bay, the Ameca River, and the Sierra Madre Mountains.
description.es: Ubicado en el Sky Lounge en la parte superior de la nueva Torre 5 de Grande Luxxe, Quinto ofrece un servicio de cocina refinada en una atmósfera relajada y lujosa con espectaculares vistas de la Bahía de Banderas, el Río Ameca y las montañas de la Sierra Madre.

header.en: The Best of Land and Sea
header.es: Lo mejor de la tierra y el mar

flavor_text.en: Any steak aficionado knows the tenderloin is the most tender cut, and the rib eye is the most flavorful. Welcome to the best of both worlds. The rib eye cap is flash-cooked on our charcoal grill to buttery, umami perfection—this is one steak you’ll surely want to savor.
flavor_text.es: Cualquier aficionado a los filetes sabe que el lomo es el corte más tierno y que el rib eye es el más lleno de sabor. Bienvenido a lo mejor de los dos mundos. El corte de lomo alto de rib eye se cocina en nuestra parrilla de carbón para obtener un asado perfecto –este es uno de los filetes que seguramente querrá saborear.

flavor_text.en: Sky Lounge at Grande Luxxe Tower 5_/_Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 11 PM_/_Chef: David Vidales
flavor_text.es: Sky Lounge en la Torre 5 de Grande Luxxe_/_Lunes – Domingo 11 AM – 11 PM_/_Chef: David Vidales

description.en: At this al fresco restaurant, the quintessential American classic—the burger—gets a bold reinterpretation. Try elevated iterations, including Kobe beef with foie gras, angus beef and lobster, duck and gorgonzola, Mediterranean lamb, Asian salmon, and more. And don’t miss mouthwatering sides like the Parmesan truffle fries!
description.es: En este restaurante al aire libre, el clásico americano –la hamburguesa– ha sido reinterpretada de manera audaz. Pruebe finas y originales propuestas como la carne Kobe con foie grass, carne Angus y langosta, pato y gorgonzola, cordero mediterráneo, salmón asiático y más. ¡Y no se pierda las exquisitas guarniciones como las papas fritas trufadas con parmesano!

flavor_text.en: Try a deluxe take on the classic burger with peppercorn sauce, brie cheese, and onion confit.
flavor_text.es: Pruebe esta versión de lujo de la hamburguesa clásica que incluye salsa de grano de pimienta, queso brie y cebolla caramelizada.

flavor_text.en: Sky Lounge at Grande Luxxe Tower 5_/_Monday – Sunday 5:30 PM – 11 PM_/_Chef: David Vidales
flavor_text.es: En la Torre Punta de Grande Luxxe_/_Lunes – Domingo 5:30 PM – 11 PM_/_Chef: Óscar Baltazar

description.en: This luxurious restaurant offers Italian cuisine and steaks that are sure to delight the most discerning palate, served in a sophisticated setting. Pair a house-made pasta or risotto, or Tramonto’s specialty, prime rib, with a selection from the extensive international wine list.
description.es: Este lujoso restaurante ofrece cocina italiana y filetes que deleitarán hasta al más exigente paladar. En su atmósfera sofisticada, pruebe una pasta hecha en casa, un risotto o la costilla –especialidad de la casa– con una selección de su larga lista de vinos.

flavor_text.en: Take a trip to authentic Italy with this succulent dish consisting of veal shank braised in red wine with vegetables.
flavor_text.es: Viaje a Italia con este suculento platillo que consiste en estofado de jarrete de ternera en vino tinto y vegetales.

flavor_text.en: By The Grande Mayan Lobby_/_Monday – Sunday 5:30 PM – 1 AM_/_Chef: Salvatore Morina
flavor_text.es: Por el lobby de The Grande Mayan_/_Lunes – Domingo 5:30 PM – 1 AM_/_Chef: Salvatore Morina

header.es: Comida llena de sabor para cada estado de ánimo

flavor.es: Una refinada versión de la comida de pub en un asombroso escenario con vista al Río Ameca.

flavor.es: Cocina saludable –incluyendo ensaladas y smoothies– en una atmósfera casual.

flavor.en: Fresh appetizers, classic American and Mexican dishes, and tropical drinks
flavor.es: Aperitivos frescos, platillos clásicos americanos y mexicanos y bebidas tropicales.

flavor.en: Vibrant ceviches featuring local seafood, served in a lush garden setting
flavor.es: Deliciosos ceviches hechos con mariscos locales, servidos en un sitio con un jardín exuberante.

flavor.en: An expansive breakfast buffet and à la carte dinner with breathtaking views
flavor.es: Un amplio buffet para desayunar y cena a la carta con vistas espectaculares.

flavor.en: A variety of Spanish tapas and classic paella dishes in an al fresco atmosphere
flavor.es: Una variedad de tapas españolas y paella clásica en una atmósfera al fresco

flavor.en: From wraps and sandwiches to small dishes, delight in fresh food served poolside
flavor.es: Ofrece wraps y sándwiches, así como pequeños platillos. Deléitese con comida fresca servida junto a la piscina.

flavor.en: The flavors and spices of Cuban cooking in a lively atmosphere
flavor.es: Los sabores y especias de la cocina cubana en una atmósfera animada.

flavor.en: Fresh-baked wood-fired pizzas for take-out or delivery
flavor.es: Pizza a la leña recién horneada para llevar o para entregar.

flavor.en: Celebrate your visit to Mexico with authentic cuisine and fresh margaritas
flavor.es: Celebre su visita a México con cocina auténtica y margaritas frescas.

flavor.es: Disfrute de comida callejera mexicana o de antojitos en La Plaza.

flavor.en: Classic savory dishes, like quesadillas and burgers, or the famously fresh Catch of the Day
flavor.es: Platillos clásicos llenos de sabor como quesadillas y hamburguesas o la célebre y siempre fresca pesca del día.

flavor.en: A wide variety of delicious casual dishes, including American favorites
flavor.es: Una gran variedad de platillos deliciosos y casuales, incluyendo favoritos americanos.

flavor.en: Dine overlooking the pool from a menu full of international delicacies
flavor.es: Coma con vista a la piscina y elija entre un menú lleno de delicias internacionales.

flavor.en: From drinks to appetizers, get everything you need to refuel after a day by the pool
flavor.es: Desde bebidas hasta aperitivos, obtenga todo lo que necesita para recargar energías después de un día en la piscina.

flavor.en: A wide selection of sweet and savory crêpes in a café environment
flavor.es: Una amplia selección de crepas dulces y saladas en un ambiente de café.

flavor.en: Fresh dishes served in a heavenly rooftop lounge and pool setting
flavor.es: Platillos frescos servidos en un lounge celestial con piscina.

flavor.en: Traditional Mexican cuisine, including tacos, quesadillas, volcanes, and tortas
flavor.es: Cocina mexicana tradicional que incluye tacos, quesadillas, volcanes y tortas.

description.en: For a quick bite or delicious drink between pool dips or after an afternoon at the beach, make sure you stop by Acqua. Satisfy your cravings with a menu of classic appetizers and snacks or an icy tropical cocktail.
description.es: Para un tentempié rápido o una deliciosa bebida entre chapuzones en la piscina o después de una tarde en la playa, asegúrese de visitar Acqua. Satisfaga sus antojos con un menú de aperitivos clásicos y snacks o en cóctel tropical helado.

flavor_text.es: Cerca de Sea Garden_/_Lunes – Domingo 11 AM – 7 PM_/_Chef: Karla Colin Valkerplaken

description.en: The Ameca Social House is Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta’s 19th hole restaurant. With a sleek, stylish dining room and a gorgeous patio that offers panoramic views, the Ameca Social House is a favorite dining destination for guests. Dishes vary from classic American to posh takes on pub fare, and the extensive whiskey menu is not to be missed.
description.es: Ameca Social House es el restaurante hoyo 19 de Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta. Con un salón elegante y lleno de estilo y una hermosa terraza que ofrece vistas panorámicas, Ameca Social House es uno de los destinos gastronómicos favoritos de los huéspedes. Sus platillos van de los clásicos americanos hasta una sofisticada versión de la comida de pub. No se pierda su extenso menú de whiskys.

header.en: Elevated Pub Fare on the Green

flavor_text.en: An impressive French-trimmed bone-in rib eye steak cooked to perfection and paired with garlic mashed potatoes and grilled vegetables.
flavor_text.es: Un impresionante filete rib eye con corte francés perfectamente cocinado acompañado de puré de papa con ajo y vegetales a la parrilla.

flavor_text.en: At Grande Luxxe Residence Tower Monday – Sunday 6 AM – 10 PM Chef: Hector Illan
flavor_text.es: En la Torre Residence de Grande Luxxe_/_Lunes – Sábado 6 AM – 10 PM_/_Chef: Héctor Illán

description.en: Balance Snack Bar is the perfect place to recharge after a day of sun-soaked lounging. Balance offers a variety of healthy and delicious food and drinks. Choose from a robust menu of sandwiches, baguettes, salads, juices, or smoothies, or indulge in a creamy gelato.
description.es: Balance Snack Bar es el lugar perfecto para recargar energías después de un día bajo el sol. Balance ofrece una gran variedad de comida y bebidas deliciosas y saludables. Elija de un extenso menú de sándwiches, baguettes, ensaladas, jugos y smoothies, o deléitese con un helado.

header.en: A Healthy Approach to Casual Cuisine
header.es: Un acercamiento saludable a la cocina casual

flavor_text.en: An impressive French-trimmed bone-in rib eye steak cooked to perfection and paired with garlic mashed potatoes and grilled vegetables.
flavor_text.es: Un impresionante filete rib eye con corte francés perfectamente cocinado acompañado de puré de papa con ajo y vegetales a la parrilla.

flavor_text.en: In The Grande Mayan by Brio_/_Monday – Sunday 7:15 AM – 10:45 PM_/_Chef: Hector Illan
flavor_text.es: En The Grande Mayan, cerca de Brio_/_Lunes – Domingo 7:15 AM – 10:45 PM_/_Chef: Héctor Illán

description.en: Offering a wide variety of sandwiches, burgers, and refreshing cocktails, Balché is ideal for guests spending their day under the sun. This restaurant was named after the ancient Mayans’ sacred drink, “balché.”

flavor_text.en: Try a new and inspired twist on tacos with this dish featuring spicy octopus marinated in chili pepper.
flavor_text.es: Pruebe esta nueva e inspiradora versión de los tacos al pastor con este platillo que incluye pulpo marinado con chile.

flavor_text.en: At the Mayan Palace Pool_/_Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 6 PM_/_Chef: Laura Reynaga
flavor_text.es: En la piscina de Mayan Palace_/_Lunes – Domingo 11 AM – 6 PM_/_Chef: Laura Reynaga

description.en: Take in the charm of the Nayarit scenery and the tastes of paradise at this restaurant overlooking the lake at the center of Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta. Stop by for breakfast at an extensive buffet filled with fresh fruit, baked breads, and made-to-order omelettes. Or check out the restaurant in the evening for their famous themed dinner menus!
description.es: Contemple toda la belleza de los paisajes de Nayarit y los sabores del paraíso en este restaurante con vista al lago en el centro de Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta. Visítelo para desayunar en un gran buffet lleno de fruta fresca, pan horneado y omelettes hechos al gusto. ¡También puede visitar el restaurante por la tarde para probar sus famosos menús temáticos!

flavor_text.en: Don’t miss this famous dish of eggs scrambled with machaca and accompanied by refried beans, guacamole, salsa, and flour tortillas.
flavor_text.es: No se pierda este famoso platillo de huevos revueltos con machaca, acompañados de frijoles refritos, guacamole, salsa y tortillas de harina.

flavor_text.en: By La Plaza_/_Monday – Sunday 7 AM – 12 PM_/_Chef: Demetrio Rendón
flavor_text.es: Cerca de La Plaza_/_Lunes – Domingos 7 AM – 12 PM_/_Chef: Demetrio Rendón

description.en: You may be vacationing in Mexico, but that’s no reason your taste buds can’t take a trip to Spain! From the complex flavors of authentic paella to the rich and bright tastes of tapas, Chiringuito brings authentic Spanish food—and all of its vivid character—to your plate.
description.es: Usted podrá estar de vacaciones en México, ¡pero ese no es motivo para que su paladar no pueda viajar a España! Desde los complejos sabores de una auténtica paella hasta las exquisitas tapas, Chiringuito pone comida española auténtica –con todo su carácter intenso– directamente en su plato.

flavor_text.en: This traditional Spanish rice dish is prepared with seafood, pork, and chicken, all seasoned with the distinctive flavor of saffron.
flavor_text.es: Este platillo de arroz tradicional español se prepara con mariscos, puerco y pollo, todo sazonado con azafrán.

flavor_text.en: By The Grande Bliss Pool_/_Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 11 PM_/_Chef: Maximiliano Torres P.
flavor_text.es: Cerca de la piscina de The Grande Bliss_/_Lunes – Domingo 11 AM – 11 PM_/_Chef: Maximiliano Torres P.

description.en: Take in the beautiful view of the Ameca River and sample fresh, flavorful fare at this delightful snack and light meal spot by the Grande Luxxe Spa Tower Pools.
description.es: Contemple la hermosa vista del Río Ameca mientras prueba bocados llenos de sabor en este lugar de snacks y comida ligera cerca de las piscinas de la Torre Spa de Grande Luxxe.

header.es: Comida deliciosa cerca de la piscina

flavor_text.en: Keep it light with this sandwich made with pita bread, crab cake, remoulade sauce, and onion.
flavor_text.es: Manténgase ligero con este sándwich hecho con pan de pita, pastel de cangrejo, salsa remoulade y cebolla.

flavor_text.en: At Grande Luxxe Spa Tower Pools_/_Monday – Sunday 7 AM – 5:30 PM_/_Chef: Christian Jiménez
flavor_text.es: En las piscinas de la Torre Spa de Grande Luxxe_/_Lunes – Domingo 7 AM – 5:30 PM_/_Chef: Christian Jiménez

description.en: Havana Moon is the perfect place to delight in your tropical vacation setting while enjoying a dinner of flavorful dishes, like their famous jerk chicken. Or sip a sangria or tropical drink while you enjoy the expansive seaside views. They also offer live Caribbean music regularly and a spectacular fire show!
description.es: Havana Moon es el lugar perfecto para deleitarse durante sus vacaciones tropicales mientras disfruta de una cena con platillos llenos de sabor, como su famoso pollo salteado. También le sugerimos probar una sangría o una bebida tropical mientras disfruta de magníficas vistas junto al mar. ¡El lugar cuenta con música caribeña en vivo de manera regular y un espectacular show con fuego!

flavor_text.en: This zesty dish features tender chicken rubbed with a kicky Jamaican spice mix.
flavor_text.es: Este sabroso platillo incluye pollo tierno con una mezcla de salsas de Jamaica.

flavor_text.en: By The Grande Bliss Pool_/_Monday – Sunday 5:30 PM – 11 PM_/_Chef: Idelfonso Navarrete
flavor_text.es: Cerca de la piscina de The Grande Bliss_/_Lunes – Domingo 5:30 PM – 11 PM_/_Chef: Idelfonso Navarrete

description.en: When the craving for pizza strikes, you can rely on Il Forno di Gio to satisfy! Based out of the Havana Moon kitchen, this pizza spot specializes in wood-fired pies which get their rich flavor from the special brick oven. Available for takeout or to go, ordered to your room.
description.es: ¡Cuando el antojo de pizza comienza, usted puede confiar en que Il Forno di Gio puede satisfacerlo! Instalado en la cocina del Havana Moon, este lugar se especializa en pizzas horneadas que obtienen su delicioso sabor del horno de piedra. Disponible para llevar. También puede ordenar desde su habitación.

flavor_text.en: A pie with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, mushrooms, artichokes, prosciutto, and black olives.
flavor_text.es: Masa de pizza con salsa de tomate, queso mozzarella, hongos, alcachofas, prosciutto y aceitunas negras.

flavor_text.en: Based Out of the Havana Moon Kitchen_/_Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 11 PM_/_Chef: Chef: Rosalba Martínez
flavor_text.es: Ubicado en la cocina de Havana Moon_/_Lunes – Domingo 11 AM – 11 PM_/_Chef: Rosalba Martínez

description.en: Enjoy the vibrant flavors of Mexico at this colorful and fun eatery modeled after the classic Mexican bar and comfort food restaurant. With playful and unique décor, an extensive selection of margaritas, a beautiful patio with a front-row seat for The Lake Show, air conditioning, and a menu loaded with authentic Mexican favorites, La Cantina offers a fiesta every night. Open for both lunch and dinner.
description.es: Disfrute de los sabores vibrantes de México en este divertido lugar lleno de color, inspirado en los bares clásicos mexicanos y los restaurantes de comida casera. Con una decoración alegre y única, una extensa selección de margaritas, una hermosa terraza con asientos de primera fila para The Lake Show, aire acondicionado y un menú lleno de favoritos mexicanos auténticos, La Cantina ofrece una fiesta cada noche. Abierto tanto para almorzar como para cenar.

flavor_text.en: Traditional crispy grasshoppers with lime and chili powder, served with handmade corn tortillas and guacamole.
flavor_text.es: Chapulines crujientes tradicionales con limón y chile en polvo, servidos con tortillas de maíz hechas a mano y guacamole.

flavor_text.en: Next to The Grande Mayan_/_Monday – Sunday 12 PM – 1 AM_/_Chef: Julio Cahuich
flavor_text.es: Junto a The Grande Maya_/_Lunes – Domingo 12 PM – 1 AM_/_Chef: Julio Cahuich

description.en: For a taste of the sea, set your sights on the al fresco eatery Limón y Sal. Here you can find the best of the coast, including lobster tacos, seafood burritos, and a wide selection of ceviches made with fresh fish or shrimp and marinated in lime juice and spices.
description.es: Para una muestra de las delicias del mar, acuda al restaurante al aire libre, Limón y Sal. Aquí podrá encontrar lo mejor de las costas, como burritos de mariscos, tacos de langosta... y una amplia selección de ceviches hechos con pescado o camarones frescos marinados en jugo de limón y especias.

0.name: asian-ceviche

flavor_text.en: This ceviche stars fresh salmon seasoned with soy sauce, tamarind, ginger, sesame seeds, chili pepper, and lemongrass.
flavor_text.es: Este ceviche incluye salmón fresco sazonado con salsa de soya, tamarindo, jengibre, ajonjolí, chile y limón.

0.en: This ceviche stars fresh salmon seasoned with soy sauce, tamarind, ginger, sesame seeds, chili pepper, and lemongrass.

flavor_text.en: By Café del Lago_/_Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 6 PM_/_Chef: Oscar Rodriguez
flavor_text.es: Por Café del Lago_/_Lunes – Domingo 11 AM – 6 PM_/_Chef: Óscar Rodríguez

description.en: Overlooking the Pacific Ocean, Ola Mulata is the perfect place for a leisurely late lunch or an early dinner. This al fresco restaurant offers American favorites like burgers, sandwiches, Philly cheese steaks, and ribs, or Mexican classics like shrimp tacos, chicken fajitas, and quesadillas. Or try the house specialty, the catch of the day, prepared on a traditional open-air grill.
description.es: Con vista al Océano Pacífico, Ola Mulata es el lugar perfecto para un almuerzo placentero o para una cena por la tarde. Este restaurante al aire libre, ofrece favoritos americanos como hamburguesas, sándwiches, filetes con queso crema y costillas o clásicos como tacos de camarones, fajitas de pollo y quesadillas. Pruebe la especialidad de la casa: la pesca del día preparada en una parrilla abierta tradicional.

flavor_text.en: Savor the fresh tastes of the sea with this delicious snapper dish, cooked to order!
flavor_text.es: ¡Pruebe los frescos sabores del mar con este delicioso platillo de pargo cocinado al gusto!

flavor_text.en: By The Grande Mayan Aqua Park_/_Monday – Sunday 11 AM – 7 PM_/_Chef: Gustavo Rojas
flavor_text.es: Por el Aqua Park de The Grande Mayan_/_Lunes – Domingo 11 AM – 7 PM_/_Chef: Gustavo Rojas

description.en: Guests at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta can enjoy a delicious meal in a casual setting by visiting this restaurant by Sea Garden. Don’t miss their famous breakfast buffet, boasting every savory and sweet morning delight you could desire.
description.es: Los huéspedes en Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta pueden disfrutar de una comida deliciosa en un escenario casual visitando este restaurante ubicado cerca de Sea Garden. No se pierda su famoso buffet de desayuno, el cual cuenta con cada sabor y delicia dulce que usted podría desear por la mañana.

flavor_text.en: For a taste of Authentic Mexico, indulge in these decadent enchiladas drizzled in rich mole sauce.
flavor_text.es: Para una probada del México auténtico, disfrute de estas deliciosas enchiladas con una exquisita salsa de mole.

flavor_text.en: By Sea Garden_/_Monday – Sunday 7 AM – 11 P_/_Chef: Maribel Aguirre
flavor_text.es: Por Sea Garden_/_Lunes – Domingo 7 AM – 11 PM_/_Chef: Maribel Aguirre

description.en: For poolside dining that will please every taste, be sure to visit Samba. Known for their delicious breakfast buffet and international lunch and dinner menus, Samba has a wide range of flavorful options served in an open-air dining room.
description.es: Para comer junto a la piscina y satisfacer todos los gustos, asegúrese de visitar Samba. Conocido por su delicioso buffet de desayuno, sus almuerzos internacionales y sus menús para la cena, Samba tiene un amplio rango de opciones llenas de sabor servidas en un espacio al aire libre.

flavor_text.en: A classic lunch staple made with lettuce, green asparagus, sunflower seeds, crispy beets, and herb-marinated chicken breast.
flavor_text.es: Un clásico del almuerzo hecho con lechuga, espárragos verdes, semillas de girasol, rábanos y pechuga de pollo marinada a las hierbas.

flavor_text.es: Cerca de la piscina de The Grande Mayan_/_Lunes – Domingo 7 PM – 11 PM_/_Chef: Giovanni De la Paz

description.en: Score the quick and satisfying bite or delicious drink you’re looking for when relaxing by the Grande Luxxe Punta Pools with poolside service by Si Snack. Whether you’re craving salad, a sandwich, or small bites, Si Snack has you covered. And don’t miss out on Si Bar next door!
description.es: Encuentre el tentempié rápido o la bebida deliciosa que busca para relajarse en las piscinas de Grande Luxxe Punta con el servicio de Si Snack. Ya sea que quiera una ensalada, un sándwich o pequeños bocadillos, Si Snack puede brindárselos. ¡Y no se pierda el Si Bar en la puerta de al lado!

header.es: Cómase un snack cerca del agua

flavor_text.en: This celebrated French appetizer is served with garlic butter and parsley.
flavor_text.es: Este delicioso snack cuenta con vegetales marinados, queso de cabra, tapenade, arúgula y jamón serrano.

flavor_text.es: En las piscinas de Grande Luxxe Punta_/_Lunes – Domingo 12 PM – 6 PM_/_Chef: Felipe Hernández

description.en: Sweet Paris is on a mission to revive the art of eating crêpes. With a menu of classic entrée and dessert crêpes, fresh paninis, soups, salads, and café drinks, Sweet Paris is your go-to destination for a taste of authentic Parisian street food. Take your crêpe outside to eat on the patio overlooking the lake in front of La Plaza.
description.es: Sweet Paris tiene el propósito de revivir el arte de comer crepas. Con un menú de entradas clásicas y crepas de postre, paninis frescos, sopas, ensaladas y bebidas con café, Sweet Paris es el destino al que debe ir para probar comida callejera parisina auténtica. Lleve su crepa para comer en la terraza con vista al lago en frente de La Plaza.

flavor_text.en: Rise and shine with bacon, sausage, potatoes, mozzarella, and scrambled eggs wrapped in a fresh hot crêpe.
flavor_text.es: Delicioso tocino, salchicha, papas, mozzarella y huevos revueltos envueltos en una crepa caliente.

flavor_text.es: Primer piso de La Plaza_/_Lunes – Domingo 7:15 AM – 10:45_/_PM Chef: Alberto Sierra

description.en: This Grande Luxxe Residence Tower-exclusive rooftop restaurant and lounge offers spectacular views along with fresh, delicious bites, and refreshing cocktails. With some of the best vistas on the resort, including views of the lush Ameca River and the Sierra Madres, this unique and luxurious spot also features a gorgeous pool and surrounding loungers and sunbeds.
description.es: Este restaurante y lounge exclusivo de la Torre Residence de Grande Luxxe ofrece espectaculares vistas junto con tentempiés deliciosos y frescos así como cócteles refrescantes. Con algunas de las mejores vistas del resort, incluyendo los paisajes del maravilloso Río Ameca y la Sierra Madre, este único y lujoso sitio también cuenta con una hermosa piscina, camastros y lugares para descansar.

flavor_text.en: Your favorite salad gets reinvented with this delicious sandwich stacked with grilled chicken, egg, blue cheese, avocado, lettuce, tomato, and bacon.
flavor_text.es: Su ensalada favorita se reinventa con este delicioso sándwich con pollo a la parrilla, huevo, queso azul, aguacate, lechuga, jitomate y tocino.

flavor_text.es: Planta alta de la Torre Residence de Grande Luxxe Residence_/_Lunes – Domingo 11 AM – 6 PM_/_Chef: Christian Jiménez

description.en: If you want to enjoy traditional Mexican cuisine—tacos, quesadillas, volcanes, tortas and “frijoles charros”—in a relaxed and al fresco setting, check out this great restaurant.

flavor_text.en: Taste the authentic flavors of Mexico with this dish featuring pork that is marinated in dried chilies, spices, and pineapple, slow-roasted on a spit, and then shredded for you to enjoy in fresh tortillas.
flavor_text.es: Pruebe los auténticos sabores de México con este platillo que incluye puerco marinado en chiles secos, especies y piña, cocinado a fuego lento y después rebanado para su deleite en tortillas frescas.

El gran menú de bebidas y licores cuenta con una variedad de opciones de todo el mundo. ¡Elija cualquier cosa que despierte su interés y brinde por haber probado algo nuevo!

Located next to Epazote in the Grande Luxxe lobby and frequently featuring live music, this lounge is recipient of the T Award for its extensive array of fine tequilas, available for the sipping.

Ubicado junto a Epazote en el lobby de Grande Luxxe y frecuentemente con música en vivo, este lounge ha recibido el T Award por su extensa variedad de tequilas disponibles para degustar.

description.en: There’s only one place at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta where you can watch as an artist paints a portrait of the world with just sand, that thousands of years of Mexican history and tradition come to life through dance, that you’ll fall in love with the many sides—and personas—of a lovable clown, and you drink craft cocktails while listening to the hit-filled set of one of the area’s best DJs. That place is Santuario, the sweeping entertainment space seated at the center of Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta. Welcome to the life of the party, all under one thatched roof.
description.es: Solo hay un lugar en Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta donde usted puede observar a un artista pintando un retrato del mundo solo con arena; en donde será testigo de la manera en que miles de años de historia mexicana y tradición cobran vida a través de la danza; en el que se enamorará de las diversas facetas de un payaso adorable; y en el que usted puede beber cócteles artesanales mientras escucha a uno de los mejores DJs. Ese lugar es Santuario, el amplio espacio de espectáculos ubicado en el centro de Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta. ¡Bienvenido a una vida llena de fiesta!

header.en: Lights, Camera, and Plenty of Action

flavor_text.en: Smell the fresh coffee at Santuario each morning by 7am. There are decadent pastries and fresh smoothies to grace your palate while relaxing on the terraces and loungers taking in the gorgeous foliage and architecture around you. This location is a great place to meet your family and friends.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: Each night, Santuario comes alive with amazing showcases of talent; live art demonstrations, mesmerizing unique acts, tickling the ivory keys of a piano, strumming the guitar or playing other cultural instruments, traditional dance, jazz, singers and acrobatics. Sit up close and watch the show or hang back near the side lounges and request a professionally prepared drink from one of the award winning mixologists. For details about the evening show contact your concierge.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: Passports are required for everyone traveling to Mexico, including children._/_As you pass through Immigration, the officer gives back a portion of the immigration form. You must keep this in a safe place. It is recommended to keep it inside your passport. You must show this portion of the immigration form to depart Mexico._/_The resort is vigilant in creating safe, healthy environments for its members. Purified water from the tap and bottled water are in all the rooms and in all of the restaurants water in all of our restaurants.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: Once you book your vacation, you can arrange transportation from the airport to the resort by following the information sent to you in your confirmation email or visiting the following site: shuttleservices.vidanta.com. At this site, you will be able to reserve your transportation using your reservation number. A confirmation slip will then be emailed to you directly from the transportation company once they’ve reviewed and accepted your request. When You Arrive Transportation to Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta is provided by Gapsa Vallarta. When you get through customs at the airport, exit the International Arrivals area. Look for a driver wearing black pants and a tan shirt, carrying a Gapsa Vallarta sign marked with your resort hotel logo.
flavor_text.es: Disfrute de sus vacaciones con esta bebida fresca de Santuario, cuyo protagonista es el sabor ahumado del mezcal, que se mezcla con cítricos y jengibre para ofrecer un toque de intensidad.

flavor_text.en: The new entrance allows guests to arrive at the resort much quicker. It is located right after the bridge that crosses the Ameca River. The previous entrance is closed to all traffic.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

description.en: Guests of all ages can choose to spend each day at Grand Luxxe Resort differently or the same. There are many opportunities to have new experiences from Mexican cultural experiences to basking in this sunny paradise near the ocean or pool. The resort offers a vast number of activities to explore as well as multiple gorgeous pools and water featured landscapes of beauty. Grand Luxxe has exquisite resort shopping with products from Mexico and other countries around the world.
description.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: The variety of pools, a Lazy River, an Aqua Park, water fountains and waterfalls are all inviting to those that love the water or enjoy spending time at the pool. You can choose a different luxurious location every day.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: There are endless resort activities to enjoy your days for all ages from kids to adults.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: At the center of Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta’s shopping experience is La Plaza, a three-story facility filled with specialty boutiques, food counters, a bazaar, and so much more.
flavor_text.es: Una de las mejores experiencias de compra en Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta se encuentra en La Plaza, un edificio de tres pisos lleno de boutiques, comida, un bazar y mucho más.

description.en: As a guest of Grande Luxxe Nuevo Vallarta, you have a vast selection of the most stunning pools in Mexico. You may choose a different pool each day; Grand Luxxe Exclusive pools, The Grand Bliss pools, The Grand Mayan pools, The Mayan Palace pools or The Sea Garden pools.
description.es: Un tobogán en una pirámide maya. Un Río Lento que corre por el resort. Un Aqua Park con toboganes y piscinas de olas. Hermosas piscinas con jacuzzis, fuentes y cascadas. Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta ofrece unas vacaciones llenas de diversión y aventura para los huéspedes de todos los resorts. ¿Está listo para mojarse?

title.es: Piscina circular de la Torre 1 de Grande Luxxe

flavor.en: Surrounded by a beautiful lounge deck, this gorgeous round pool is located right next to Grande Luxxe Tower 1.
flavor.es: Rodeada de una hermosa plataforma de lounge, esta bella piscina está ubicada junto a la Torre 1 de Grande Luxxe.

title.es: Piscina infinita de la Torre 1 de Grande Luxxe

flavor.en: Boasting an infinity edge and Jacuzzis nestled into one side, this expansive pool, located directly adjacent to Tower 1 Pool 1 and by Blue Fish, has an activities stand and a lounge deck.
flavor.es: Con un borde infinito y jacuzzis en su costado, esta amplia piscina adyacente a la piscina 1 de la Torre 1 (cerca de Blue Fish), tiene un stand de actividades y una plataforma de lounge.

title.es: Piscina solo para adultos de Grande Luxxe

flavor.en: Located just off from the Mayan Palace Pool, this oval-shaped, adults-only pool overlooks the ocean.
flavor.es: Apartada de la piscina de Mayan Palace, esta piscina ovalada es solo para adultos y tiene vista al mar.

title.es: Piscina este de Grande Luxxe Punta

flavor.en: This distinctive pool boasts a famous spiral shape and expansive lounging area while offering sweeping views of the Ameca River and Bay of Banderas. Featuring a horseshoe-shaped cluster of Jacuzzis, a swim-up bar, and food service by Si Snack.
flavor.es: Esta piscina distintiva cuenta con la famosa forma de espiral y una amplia zona de lounge mientras ofrece magníficas vistas del Río Ameca y la Bahía de Banderas. También tiene jacuzzis con forma de herradura, un bar acuático y el servicio de comida de Si Snack.

title.es: Piscina oeste de Grande Luxxe Punta

flavor.en: This petite pool is located between a lovely lagoon and Punta Pool East, and boasts a large, beautiful lounge area. Featuring a swim-up bar and activities stand nearby.
flavor.es: Esta pequeña piscina está ubicada entre la hermosa laguna y la piscina este de Punta y cuenta con una amplia y bella zona de lounge. Posee un bar acuático y un stand de actividades cercano.

title.es: Piscinas de la Torre de Spa de Grande Luxxe

flavor.en: This pool cluster includes several secluded coves and a surrounding lounge, where you can enjoy a beverage or bite from the adjacent restaurant, Fresh Co. Featuring an activities stand and swim-up bar.
flavor.es: Este grupo de piscinas incluye caletas apartadas y un lounge que las rodea, en donde se puede disfrutar de una bebida o tentempié del restaurante adyacente, Fresh Co. Cuenta con un stand de actividades y un bar acuático.

title.en: Grande Luxxe Residence Sky Garden Pool
title.es: Piscina del Sky Lounge de la Torre 5 de Grande Luxxe

flavor.en: Located on top of the Grande Luxxe Residence building, this rectangular pool is surrounded by lounge beds. Guests can enjoy food and beverages from the Fresh Co Sky Garden restaurant.
flavor.es: Solo para los huéspedes que se hospedan en Grande Luxxe Residence 4 Bedroom.

title.en: Grande Luxxe Tower 5 Sky Lounge Pool
title.es: Piscina de Kid’s Club de Grande Luxxe

flavor.en: This brand-new rooftop pool is perched at the top of Grande Luxxe Tower 5. Located next to Quinto Charcoal Cuisine, this gorgeous pool features an infinity edge, so that its azure waters blend into the vibrant blue of the sky.
flavor.es: Admire los paisajes de su paraíso mientras disfruta de lo más fino que las vacaciones de lujo tienen que ofrecer en esta nueva piscina situada en la parte superior de la Torre 5 de Grande Luxxe. Ubicada junto a Quinto Charcoal Cuisine, esta hermosa piscina cuenta con un borde infinito, así que sus azules aguas se mezclan con el cielo.

flavor.en: Grande Luxxe guests can drop their children off at the Grande Luxxe-exclusive Kid’s Club, located just off from the Spa Tower Pool, by Grande Luxxe Tower 3 and 4. Here, they can enjoy some fun in the sun under the supervision of our wonderful Kid’s Club staff.
flavor.es: Los huéspedes de Grande Luxxe pueden dejar a sus niños en el Kid’s Club exclusivo de Grande Luxxe, ubicado justo fuera de la piscina de la Torre de Spa, por la Torre 3 y 4. Aquí, ellos se divertirán bajo la supervisión de nuestro maravilloso equipo de Kid’s Club.

description.en: The Norman Signature Course and The Nayar Course are home to two of Nuevo Vallarta’s champion courses. There is a newly opened 10 hole, par-3 course, The Jack Nicklaus Golf Academy along with an exquisite new restaurant and the longest golf cart suspension bridge in the world. This is a golfer’s haven of happiness like no other.
description.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: This 18-hole, par 70 naturally and architecturally enhanced notable wonder welcomes beginners to advance. The seven lakes and 49 selectably designed bunkers create quite the opposition for the skillful golfer.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: The 18-hole Greg Norman Signature Course is newly completed with an alluring and gorgeous layout that can only be accessed by the Ameca Bridge; the longest golf cart bridge in the world. This course is nestled in the tall perennial Bahiagrasses and cleverly designed greens.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: This magnificent 10 hole, par-3 course is the most recent development of golf offerings at the resort. It shines with the most breathtaking views of some of the resort’s most admired landmarks while you play. It uniquely offers night playing with a lighted golf course until 11pm.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

description.en: The Sierra Madre Mountains serve as a backdrop along with the emerald jungle nearby and the Pacific Ocean on the other side. The Nayar Course is a pleasure and a desired challenge for all golfers, from a low to high handicap. The seven lakes, 49 strategically placed bunkers and the strong ocean winds definitely create an experience to be remembered.
description.es: **Needs Translation**

header.en: The Nayar Course at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta
header.es: El Campo Nayar en Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta

bullets: Espacio para practicar iluminado (abierto hasta las 10:30 PM)

description.en: The Norman Signature Course provides the golfer with a superior fairways and greens encounter that urges the player an unmatched appealing invitation. The sweeping Bahiagrass playing areas, the pleasant breezes of the Ameca River and the majestic Sierra Madre Mountain views offer sensory delights in every direction. This Norman inspired course gives expansive landing areas off the tee into generous rolling cavernous bunkers.

description.en: Treat yourself to a pampering like no other. You deserve to be renewed and restored. Embrace the unique wellness treatments that will bring you peace and serenity from head to toe. The choice of two exquisite spas are ready to rejuvenate your body, mind and spirit to a new ecstasy. You will have the best spa experience of your life.
description.es: **Needs Translation

flavor_text.en: Open to every guest. The Brio Spa has a French approach with a European flare. When you step through the door you will immediately feel the magical release of stress and feel relaxation cascade over you.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: This upscale spa is only for Grand Luxxe guests. The offerings at the Spatium exceeds any spa experience you have had before. The palatial Spatium soars the spa experience beyond your expectations or dreams. The opulent and breathtaking luxurious indoor and outdoor surroundings soothes your mind, body and spirit with the most current spa treatments and methods of relaxation.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: Wellness is a choice that we can strive to achieve. Guests are offered a chance to embark on this health improving journey. The Wellness Program guides with steps to take to reach a greater harmony with the mind, body and spirit connection of living a more whole and joyful life. Contact your concierge for more information.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

description.en: There is a spectrum of luscious treatments in the categories of traditional, holistic and themes. Your journey can be the design of your choosing along with rituals and natural ingredients from Mexico. Let go, release and enjoy. You deserve it.
description.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: Location is nestled in the emerald jungle at Grand Luxxe Residence Tower. Spatium blends treatments of beauty with natural cultural healing inside extravagant furnishings to enable you to feel more pampered than ever before. The lavish surroundings inside and outside bring deep relaxation and joy like heaven on earth.
flavor_text.es: **NEeds Translation**

flavor_text.en: Open only to Grand Luxxe guests. Spatium soars the spa experience above all others with its unique luscious water therapy offerings in the midst of palm trees, dancing water fountains and billowy cushioned chairs.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

description.en: Brio Spa provides you with a complete selection of treatments that taps into an array of authentic cultural methods from all over the world.  Embrace the healing and restoration that Brio Spa will offer you.
description.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: Brio Spa location is in The Grand Mayan. It draws from the classic French art of pampering with exquisite architectural designs. Invite the mind, body and spirit to enjoy the choices of therapeutic treatments that will leave you as light as air. After your treatment, relax in the outdoor area under a palapa, submerge in the Jacuzzi or invigorate in the cold plunge.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

tagline.en: The Healing Powers of the Temazcal

flavor_text.en: Allow the purification ritual of the Temazcal, an ancient sweat lodge from the cultural roots of the Mexican Shaman guided ritual to help your body and soul detox and be set free. See the staff at Brio Spa to schedule this unique Temazcal experience.
flavor_text.es: **NEeds Translation**

description.en: As the evening approaches, that’s when the resort starts rocking with a variety of entertainment choices. Light shows that leave you speechless. Party celebrations with food, music, culture and fun. Professional entertainers: musicians, dancers, acrobatics, singers, clowning and unique artists’ offerings. It’s up to you which way you prefer to take on the night and have an amazing fun time.
description.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: Watch in amazement at the expansive 75,000-square-foot, indoor-outdoor entertainment pavilion. Santuario offers a different show each night that the entire family will love: musical and dance performances, acrobatics, unique artists’ demonstrations plus even more. Sit back, relax and watch the show as you allow your taste buds to be tantalized with special drinks from the award winning bartenders and specialty drink designers.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: Once the sun has set La Cantina and Gong begin their spectacular light show with glowing colors dancing to the music and glistening through the lake and fountains. No show is the same so you can be delightfully dazzled at the lake and light show every night.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: Step into an evening of Mexican culture. Stunning local dancers and singers will capture your full attention. The entire family will love Theme Nights and Family Movie Nights. The Grand Bliss beach invites you to enjoy an evening beach party of authentic Mexican food flavors and mariachi band. You will hear the music and smell the amazing aromas before you even step onto the sand. The Family Movie Nights are often near one of the pools, contact activities for location.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: Be entertained by the local sought after talented musicians in multiple locations around the resort. There are a variety of genres offered. One will certainly tickle your fancy: Cuban, mariachi, Jazz, classic piano, saxophone or other common and unique instruments. Be sure to visit The Grand Lobby Bar, Santuario, Azur, La Cantina or Havana Moon for a sound and visual experience to remember. Havana Moon performers often encourage and lead the guests in dancing fun. Contact your concierge for the schedule of musician performers.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

tagline.es: No hay un mejor lugar para celebrar

flavor_text.en: You are certain to experience a Holiday that you will forever remember. Invite your family and friends to share the most joyous Holiday of their life. The resort shines with delight during special occasions with Holiday theme honored activities, special events and celebrations. Be sure to contact your concierge for the schedule of Holiday offerings.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: It’s your vacation, do what you love! At Grand Luxxe Nuevo Vallarta, choose from a variety of activities, Spanish classes, arts and crafts, games, sports tournaments, poolside trivia or special events all lead by the amazing activities team called the Joy Squad.
flavor_text.es: Son sus vacaciones... ¿Por qué no las pasa haciendo exactamente lo que le gusta? En Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta encontrará una gran variedad de actividades, desde torneos de deporte a clases de arte, así como juegos de trivia junto a la piscina. Todas son organizadas por nuestro increíble equipo de actividades, el Joy Squad.

flavor_text.en: The resort has a group of people on staff just to make you happy. The Joy Squad can always be recognized by their bright smiling faces and readiness to help you. Their mission is to bring you joy, fun, excitement and new experiences. There are several Activities Stands. Be sure to visit them and get a schedule of what’s being offered each day.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

Kid’s Club is a great time for the kids!  The Kid’s Club is located by The Grand Mayan wave pool. There are many activities offered and of course water activities at the on-premise pool for children ages 5 to 12. The expert staff provides supervision during all activities. There are special week night theme activities like Pirate Night or Pajama Party for an additional charge. This is a time the adults can drop off the children and enjoy an evening at the resort knowing their children are having fun and well cared for. There is also a Grande Luxxe-exclusive Kid’s Club located by Grand Luxxe Tower 4.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: Want some unique adventures? On and off resort experiences are offered by outside companies. The beach offers stand-up paddle boarding, surfing and kayaking. For high adventure recreation and exploring the Riviera Nayarit area there is zip-lining in the jungle, horseback riding to the waterfall, speed boat riding, snorkeling or deep sea fishing. Visit the travel concierge in your resort hotel lobby to coordinate a plan.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: Almaverde is a 40 acre farm that produces 65 types of vegetables and fruits that are used at all the resort restaurants. The resort proudly provides their guests with fresh farm to table produce. Contact your concierge to tour.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

tagline.es: Torre 5 de Grande Luxxe y Quinto

flavor_text.en: This impressive new tower dazzles the eye with breathtaking views of the entire resort: the nearby Ameca River, the tranquil Banderas Bay and the Sierra Madre Mountains in the background. The rooftop Quinto Restaurant offers a morning brunch as well as food and drink poolside service with a smile. And of course the Joy Squad visits you by your lounge chair to clean your sunglasses and offer you a variety of flavors of Mexico popsicles.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**

flavor_text.en: The professional mixologists teach you all about the history and types of tequila. This well known Mexican liquor has many levels of quality and variations in color. Your new acquired knowledge will help you discern the best tequila for every occasion.
flavor_text.es: **Needs Translation**
